page.title: 11Holidaying in Carnoustie.
page.content: The beautiful beach,tempting shops, spotless parks,great golf,close-by country-side - all these attract hundreds of tourists to Carnoustie every year.These people use the excellent hotels within the Carnoustie area. At the Earlston Hotel lunch-hour and the evenings are the busiest times. Week-ends are busier than week-days probably because people work on week-days and not week-ends At the Dalhousie Hotel high tea is the busiest time of the day. Both these hotels allow their guests to bring their pets with them on holiday.People come from all over the world -- America,Sweden,Australia,Nor- way,Canada,New Zealand......... Prices vary among the different hotels from roughly Â£8.50 to Â£16.50, allowing everyone to visit Carnoustie.
